case.name: Arash Gamethrowing Announcement
case.description: Arash declares that he's too horny to keep playing seriously and he's going to start throwing the game so he can get to masturbating sooner.

case.name: Arash Mysterious Fan
case.description: Arash pulls out a hand fan to cool himself down, but doesn't know where it came from.

case.name: Arash Hugs
case.description: Arash tries to get the other players to hug him.

case.name: Stella
case.description: Arash shouts the name of his Noble Phantasm when he finishes, probably confusing everyone else.

case.name: Arash Snacks
case.description: Arash offers to buy snacks for the other players. He might also offer drinks ("drinks" marker) or specifically mention hummus ("hummus" marker).

case.name: Arash and N Sweater
case.description: Arash offers N his sweater as a blanket, but then realizes it's missing.

case.name: Arash FMK
case.description: Arash gives an amusing response to a fuck-marry-kill question.

case.name: Arash Servant
case.description: Arash mentions being a Servant. He'll probably explain what that means in the next line, if he hasn't already.

case.name: Arash Servant Explanation
case.description: Arash explains what being a Servant means.

case.name: Don't You Worry Child
case.description: Arash mentions his favorite song. If the "sing" marker is set, he actually starts singing it.

case.name: Arash Gamethrowing 2
case.description: Alternate case for Arash Gamethrowing Announcement.

case.name: Thinking of Friends
case.description: Arash thinks of one or two fellow Servants. This sets a marker so he'll ask a question inspired by them later.

notes.note: It's a bit beyond my skill level, but it'd be fun to see this expanded into a whole exchange.
Would be fun to see this expanded into a little exchange.
I don't know why I've always associated that song with Arash but it just *clicked*.
For anyone interested, here's my source for Arash's prayers: http://www.avesta.org/kanga/ka_english_kanga_epub.pdf

markers.marker: Arash tells Aella he doesn't mind if she watches him.
Arash is thinking about Anne and Mary.
Arash answers Brock's question about weapons.
Arash quietly prays if things look like they're going pear-shaped.
Arash calms himself by reciting prayers in Avestan if he's nervous about a bad hand.
Arash answers one of Jesse's questions.
Arash mentiones that he can play the bass guitar.
Arash compliments Blake's ears.
Arash talks about what being an archer means to him.
Arash tries to warn Chun-Li that Juri's behind her.

When he's finished masturbating, Arash is tapped out enough he gets a little dizzy if other arousing stuff happens. This marker tracks when he mentions feeling overstimulated, in case anyone wants to respond.
Arash offered drinks during the snack-buying line.
Arash offers a hug to D.va when she asks for one.
Arash is thinking about Edison and Tesla.
Checks whether Arash has complained about an opponent's choice of clothing to remove.
Arash expresses interest in Florina's song.
Arash offers a hug to a gloomy character, thinking they probably need it.
Arash is thinking about Hans.
Arash mentioned hummus during the snack-buying line.
Arash tells Jessie he can't help the messy hair.
Arash compliments Joey on her vanishing tricks.
Arash is curious about the text floating around Jotaro.
Kamina mentioning the light of the morning sun leaves Arash reminiscing about the day he died.
Arash is thinking about Kiyohime.
Arash offers a hug to Kyoko after seeing her burnt hands.
Arash asks about Mia's magatama.
Arash is thinking about Martha.
Arash tells Megumin he's fought dragons.
Arash explains to Megumin that some people like how shaved bits look.
Arash tells Megumin about protecting the timestream.
Arash protests Megumin claiming trophies.
Arash mentions being able to shoot meteors.
Arash expresses interest in Misato's offer of drinks.
Arash offers Misato a hug when she's unhappy about Bi.
Arash tries to give N masturbation advice.
Arash promises to keep Nagisa's secret.
Arash isn't happy about Nami stealing clothes.
Arash offers Natsuki a chair.
Arash finds N's rambling about math endearing.
Arash offers to help N with his necklace.
Arash offers N his scarf as a blanket, then realizes he can't find it.
Arash is thinking about Okita.
Arash explains why he didn't intervene in Meia and Revy's fight.
Arash asked a question about inseperable people.
Arash asked a question about rivalries.
Arash asked a question about looking younger than you are.
Arash asked a question about obsession.
Arash asked a question about public versus private selves.
Arash asked a question about getting sick.
Arash asked a question about isolation.
Arash asked a question about cute couples.
Arash answers Revy's question about his tastes in music.
Arash offers a hug to Ryu when he's sad about taking off sentimental accessories.
Arash notes that Ryuko and Senketsu make cute cuddlers.
Arash assures Ryuko he's not in pain.
Arash is apparently more startled that Saki decided to take off her makeup by dumping water on her head than that she's a zombie.
Marks a few lines where Arash gently scolds another player for making someone else at the table uncomfortable.
Arash tells Sei about his perpetually messy hair.
Arash is thinking about Serenity.
Arash has mentioned being a Servant.
Arash offers to steady Shimikaze while she gets her balance.
Arash has a few lines where he starts singing - they're marked with this.
Small talk question about animals.
Small talk question about books.
Small talk question about what people think about when they can't sleep.
Small talk question about cooking.
Small talk question about drunken escapades.
Small talk question about silly excuses.
Small talk question about flowers.
Small talk question about hobbies.
Small talk question about holidays.
Small talk question about what people always keep with them.
Small talk question about how late people stay up.
Small talk question about names and their meanings.
Small talk question about seasons.
Small talk question about favorite shirts.
Small talk question about music.
Small talk question about weather.
Small talk question about how people think.
Small talk question about travel.
Arash offers to spar with characters who have weapons.
Arash interprets Star Platinum's forfeit help as probably more affectionate than Jotaro meant it to be.
Arash is apparently magical and/or badass enough to see Stands.
Arash muses about ultimate attacks.
Arash asks for a washcloth for Chazz.
Arash is thinking about Waver and Iskandar.
Arash answers Yuelia's question about looking younger than one's years.
Arash answers Yuelia's question about luck.
